agents._comment: This is an example of how you would monitor an on-premises SQL instance, remove this section if you are not using SQL Server or duplicate this section if you have multiple servers.
agents.name: Production Database
agents._includesComment: An array of JSON objects containing a property 'name' which is the name of the database you would like to include in your monitoring.

agents._comment: This is an example of how you would monitor a SQL Azure instance, remove this section if you are not using SQL Azure or duplicate this section if you have multiple servers.
agents.name: Azure Cloud Database
agents.connectionString: Server=tcp:{Azure SQL Server Name}.database.windows.net,1433;Database={Azure SQL Database Name};User ID={Azure SQL User Name}@{Azure SQL Server Name};Password={Password for User Name};Trusted_Connection=False;Encrypt=True;Connection Timeout=30;
